channel.title: Portofolio on Quentin Ackermann
channel.description: Recent content in Portofolio on Quentin Ackermann

item.title: Project 2 : Redemption (C#/Unity)
item.description: Created step-by-step a horror story Welcome screen Designed the levels of the game Took a dive in game designing, which is an amazing field It was really incredible to find out the complexity and the variety of work behind a game as simple as this one ! I have to admit that I won’t take lightly anymore the efforts made from the editors to provide the gamers with a wonderful experience !

item.title: Project 1 : Lunchz App (Angular)
item.description: Created a nice front-end with Angular and PrimeNG Front-end created with Angular and PrimeNG Designed a robust back-end using Java/Spring Boot Realized a real-life SQL base using Postgresql Decide where to take a lunch each day with this amazing app ! Using Angular, the purpose is to vote for the place you want to eat at. In many companies, people have a set of places where they fetch their lunch, however sometimes they have difficulties to decide where everyone want to go.

item.title: Project 2 : Bank targeting campaign
item.description: Analyzed a dataset from a bank campaign to discover what elements may conduct a potential client to subscribe Preprocess the data to make them relevant and algo-friendly ! Tried out different models to find the best fit : Logistic Regression RandomForest KNN Decision Tree Bagging algorithm Optimized the models using GridSearchCV Built a tool that determine if a customer is likely to subscribe and how the bank can improve its campaign

item.title: Project 1 : Covid19 Dataset
item.description: Analyzed a Covid19 Dataset to understand the relation between the features and the target Vizualisation of the service the ill are oriented to, based on their Lymphocytes rate Preprocess the data to make them relevant and algo-friendly Tried out different models to find the best fit : RandomForest AdaBoost SVM KNN Optimized one of the models using GridSearchCV and RandomizedSearchCV

item.title: Project 1 : picoCTF
item.description: Trained the 50 first challenges ! Welcome to the picoCTF homepage ! Link to the GitHub repository
